text: Back in 2013, Phil McGraw gave Forbes some advice : “ Let ’ s just pay attention and form data - based assumptions and judgments about who somebody is.'' Some critical data on the psychologist - turned - television - host? Dr. Phil earned $ 79 million last year, making him the highest - paid TV host in the world. His sky - high earnings are mainly thanks to his eponymous daytime talk show : In addition to money from product placements, he splits the advertising profits from the show. The result adds up to over 90 % of his total paycheck.
